name: jeff becomes a christian
description:
An extremely cursed game that will take 5-10 minutes to obtain all 3 endings.

The second game in the IDK Project series.

Synopsis:

Jeff (AKA Satan) decides to go to a church and be baptized. He runs into his previous summoners. Drama happens.

WARNINGS:

Contains death jokes, references to memes, talk of blood and murder, and creates an unrealistic "religious" scenario.

MUSIC CREDIT:

"GISHIKI" by Atelier Nonta

"Monster Rival" by ISAo
